QuestData.Title: Precious Goods
QuestData.Description: The gates further down the canyon are shut. Our scouting revealed some kind of stone that they carry in chests in their caravans that they use to open the gates.$B$BGet down there and look for a chest key on the bodies of the guards. When you find it, use it on one of those chests on the caravan wagons and bring the gatestone back to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve a Twilight Caravan Gatestone. The Spearwardens should carry keys that can get you into the gatestone chests.
QuestData.CompletionText: You know, we could probably just blow the gates, but knowing our demoman, we're probably better off dodging the risk.
QuestData.RewardText: Good going.$B$BDoesn't look like much, does it?
